userdoc.notice: IStaticERC1967Proxy is a static version of the ERC1967 proxy interface.

documentation.text:
@title IStaticERC1967Proxy
 @notice IStaticERC1967Proxy is a static version of the ERC1967 proxy interface.

@title IStaticL1ChugSplashProxy
 @notice IStaticL1ChugSplashProxy is a static version of the ChugSplash proxy interface.
@notice A mapping of proxy types, used for backwards compatibility.

@notice The address of the address manager, this is required to manage the
         ResolvedDelegateProxy type.
@notice A legacy upgrading indicator used by the old Chugsplash Proxy.
@param _owner Address of the initial owner of this contract.

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "ProxyAdmin: call to proxy after upgrade failed"

arguments.value: ProxyAdmin: call to proxy after upgrade failed

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "ProxyAdmin: call to proxy after upgrade failed"

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (address,bytes memory) payable external returns (bytes memory)
function (address,bytes memory) payable external returns (bytes memory)
